name: graphql-blog-posts-server
description: This is a graphql server that stores blog posts in memory; no database hence the data in not persistent. The idea is to have a good grasp of how graphql works for it's data agnostic.

scripts.install: cd api; npm i; cd ..; cd client; npm i
scripts.start: concurrently "cd api; npm start;" "cd client; npm start;"

author: Joe Ng'ethe
